plugins.name: Guides inspector
plugins.description:
The Guides inspector is complete control over the guides!

‚úÖ You can:
- Create / Delete guides.
- Copy / Paste guides of the frame.
- Generate grids from guides.
- Create guide templates for later use.
- Adjust the position of the guides with high accuracy.

‚ö† Changes on the canvas are sometimes displayed only after you hover over it. This bug should be fixed soon.

About the Create Guides window:
‚ö† To get into it, you need to click on the name of the frame.

1. The Margin parameter is specified in the following order: margin-top, margin-right, margin-bottom, margin-left.

2. Some parameters support the "auto" value. 

It can be used, for example, to center the columns by setting the margin-left and margin-right parameters to "auto".
If you specify it only for margin-left, and margin-right set to 0, then the columns will be pressed to the right edge.

‚ö† When applying the template, - if its parameters are not suitable for the selected frame, - they will be adjusted.

For example, if the template contains 10 columns with a width of 100px, and the frame has a width of only 500px, then the number of columns will be reduced to 5.

___
A demo video with an example of usage can be found here: producthunt.com/posts/guides-inspector-figma-plugin

accepted.description: Digital designer. I love the design, the code and the cock crow in the morning :) Freelancer.

plugins.name: Ultimate GIF Maker - Free Unlimited Exports
plugins.description:
The ultimate all-in-one GIF maker: import Figma frames, adjust frame delays and other settings, then export your GIF instantly to your computer. I use this to make all of my plugin preview GIF images.


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin, select Figma frames, then click "Import Frames."
  2. Reorder the GIF frames and customize the settings.
  3. Click "Download" to save the GIF file.


Features

  1. Individual Delay: Edit custom delay on each frame (100 = 1 second).
  2. Import Scale: Apply scale factor when importing selected frames (change in settings).
  3. Import Order: Sort the selected frames before importing them.
  4. Auto Order: Automatically sorted alphabetically by Frame names.
  5. Auto Delay: If an imported frame's name has d20 or d100, the delay is set to 20 or 100 automatically.
  6. Transparent Background: Paint your frame's background with any color (like pink #ff00ff) and enable Transparent Background, type ff00ff to replace pink color with empty color.
  7. Draggable: Click and drag GIF frames to swap the order
  8. Live Preview: Any change on the frames or settings will automatically change the GIF preview


Free Version

  1. Create unlimited GIFs.
  2. Export size is limited to 256px.
  3. Maximum of 8 frames per GIF.


Pro Version

One-time payment unlocks full access to:

  1. Create unlimited GIFs.
  2. Export up to 8K resolution.
  3. Unlimited frames per GIF.
  4. All future updates.

Click the FREE button to purchase the Pro version.


Credit

  1. Magnifier plugin in the preview image
  2. Chaos Pattern plugin in the preview image
  3. This plugin uses a modified version of gif.js by jnordberg.

accepted.name: Saranomy
accepted.description: I make premium Figma Plugins

plugins.tagline: Create animated GIFs from your frames and export it

plugins.name: Nested Corners
plugins.description:
Apply the perfect corner radius to nested layers based on the parent corner radius and padding.


üëâ Usage

  1. Set the corner radius of the parent frame.
  2. Make sure the parent frame has auto layout enabled and its padding is uniform.
  3. Select the child layer and run the plugin.


‚úÖ Supported

  • Apply to multiple selections at once
  • Frames with mixed corner radii
  • Corner smoothing


‚ùå Not Supported

  • Frames with mixed padding
  • Layer types other than RECTANGLE, FRAME, and COMPONENT
  • Changing the parent corner radius based on child corner radius

plugins.name: Figma to React Bootstrap
plugins.description:
Website:

https://figma-to-react-bootstrap.vercel.app/

How to use this plugin?:

How to use: Figma to React Bootstrap Plugin


Figma to React Bootstrap

This cool plugin takes your figma designs that uses the Figma components from Figma to React Bootstrap file and turns them into ready-to-use React-Bootstrap components. It's like having a design wizard by your side, so you can spend more time building your layouts. The preview mode offers an awesome user experiences that shows in real time the rendered react component.


Figma to React Bootstrap Figma Component library

This component file library has been especially made to follow the React Bootstrap components API to match it's component's props, making it easier to use out of the box instances to use in your designs.


ProTip!: As long as your layers are named after React Bootstrap components and follow the same nested components structure, then the plugin will render the React Bootstrap component


ÔªøSupported components:

  1. ‚úÖ Grid
  2. ‚ùåForms
  3. ‚úÖ Accordion
  4. ‚úÖ Alerts
  5. ‚úÖ Badge
  6. ‚úÖ Breadcrumb
  7. ‚úÖ Button group
  8. ‚úÖ Buttons
  9. ‚úÖ Card
  10. ‚úÖ Carousels
  11. ‚úÖ Close button
  12. ‚úÖ Dropdowns
  13. ‚úÖ Figures
  14. ‚ùå Images
  15. ‚úÖ Figures
  16. ‚úÖ List groups
  17. ‚úÖ Modal
  18. ‚úÖ Navbars
  19. ‚úÖ Navs and tabs
  20. ‚ùå Offcanvas
  21. ‚ùå Overlay
  22. ‚úÖ Pagination
  23. ‚ùå Placeholders
  24. ‚ùå Progress bars (in progress)
  25. ‚úÖ Spinners
  26. ‚úÖ Tables
  27. ‚ùå Tabs
  28. ‚úÖ Toast (and Toast container)


*This plugin does not export your custom styles yet

* This plugin is meant to render default styled React Bootstrap components.

* Maybe in the future I will implement custom styling export.


If you want to support my work in other ways:

  1. ‚òïÔ∏è Buy me a coffee


Thank you!

accepted.description:

https://shop.plusuidesign.com/

plugins.name: Select The Same Instance
plugins.description:
Allows you to select only instances with a specific variant from within a selection such as a group or frame. This can be used, for example, to select only those buttons in the selection that have a Size of Big and a Shape of Round.


How To Use

  1. Select the group or frame that contains the instance you want to select.
  2. Activate this plug-in.
  3. Choose the Component Set name.
  4. Select all the values of the variant you want to select.
  5. Press the Select button.


Is it difficult to understand? Please refer to the video.

https://cloud.nju33.com/6LKZbultMemOiNSamKev

plugins.name: Distributor
plugins.description:
A lightweight plugin for Figma that spaces elements evenly by exact pixel measurements.


You can space items vertically or horizontally from their edges or their centers. Alignment options also let you choose which side the items are distributed towards. Elements are repositioned based on their bounding boxes, so the plugin works on rotated objects as well.


Source Code:

https://github.com/yeemachine/distributor

accepted.name: Richard Yee
accepted.description: Visual Designer/Creative Technologist

plugins.name: Style to JSON
plugins.description:
Export Style as JSON File. Run Once and File Download Automatically.

Feel free to comment your feedback!


Easy-to-use HEX and rgba() format

All color style will be convert into convenient Hex, Hex8 and rgba() format, so it's easier for developers to use in CSS file.


Linear Gradient Styles Supported

For gradient styles, linear-gradient styles are supported, and they will be convert into CSS syntax format like: "linear-gradient(180deg, #ffffff 0%, #ff0000 100%)"


Effect Styles Supported

Effect Styles are included as well, and they will be convert to easy-to-use css properties like: "1px 3px 2px 0px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) inset"


Multi-layer Styles are not supported.

The plugin will extract all style layers into a sub-level json.


Image & Video Styles are not supported.

The plugin will ignore all image and video styles since that's non-sence for a style sheet.

accepted.name: Cong LIU
accepted.description: liucongsny@gmail.com

plugins.tagline: Run once, download style json automatically

plugins.name: Variables ‚áî CSV (Export+Import)
plugins.description:
Highlights


  1. Export text strings to CSV for bulk editing
  2. Export text strings to CSV and share with developers/translators/copy writers/reviewers
  3. Import edited CSV back to Figma to update variables
  4. Multi-lingual support built-in
  5. Simple CSV format


Supports only string variables





Non English variable values

The CSV from the plugin is encoded with UTF-8 encoding, which can handle most languages written in Unicode.


Some programs, particularly MS Excel, might not open/save the CSV properly when opened normally/directly. Follow below steps if you face issues.


Opening the CSV

  1. For MS Excel: Open a new excel file > Click Data > Get External Data > From text > Select the CSV file > Set file origin to UTF-8 in the wizard.
  2. For other programs, follow similar methods to set the file encoding to UTF-8 before opening the CSV.


Saving the CSV after editing

  1. For MS Excel: File > Save as > Change file format in the dropdown to "CSV UTF-8 (Comma delimited) (.csv)" > Save
  2. For other programs, follow similar methods to set the file encoding to UTF-8 before saving the edited CSV.

accepted.name: Vivek G
accepted.description: Product designer, half developer and everything tech in between!

plugins.tagline: Manage Figma variables on CSV with export/import options. Multi-lingual support built-in.

https://help.readdy.ai/en/help/articles/4623808-how-to-export-design


FAQ

1.How export Current Page State to Figma CanvasÔºàWhat you currently see in your eyesÔºâ ‚Äîincluding any interactive or dynamically changed content‚Äîdirectly into Figma.


Step 1. Trigger the state of the page to the state you want to export, such as when a pop-up appears or when the second tab is selected.

Step 2. Click the [Export] Button

Step 3. Click Copy

Step 4. Paste to Readdy Figma Plugin


Now, the exact UI state as seen on the page can be exported into Figma.



2.Why can‚Äôt export the whole interactions or prototype to Figma?


Because its canvas is a static canvas, it can‚Äôt play the prototype or interactions.

plugins.name: Frame History
plugins.description:
The fastest way to archive your work and look back at previous iterations. No more manual hassle - get rid of the copy/paste and duplicate pages process. 


‚úÖ Save copies of frames you're working on, in a single click.

‚úÖ Explore a visual chronological timeline of your saved frames.

‚úÖ Navigate faster with a time saving version preview.

‚úÖ Easily search and browse through saved frames.


‚öôÔ∏è How it works

Select the frame you want to save and click the Save button. Frame History will send a copy of the frame to a page called ‚ÄúFrame History‚Äù that keeps a visual chronological timeline of your saved versions.


Every time you save a version, Frame History will automatically add a version preview to the plugin‚Äôs UI. Version previews are only visible to the creator, and are easy to find using the search feature.


‚≠ê Help us improve

Feedback and questions are welcome: colorocket.contact@gmail.com


üöÄ Roadmap

Frame History is currently in beta. We are planning to add more cool features to make it even better! 


User requests:

  • Detach all instances when saving
  • Save multiple frames at once
  • Resize plugin window

plugins.description:
Write Better is an AI writing assistant powered by Gemini-Pro. This plugin was developed to assist you in improving your writing by performing various writing actions. It offers flexibility as you can choose to paste your answers directly into the text box or paste them outside your content for review and additional modifications.


The Write Better plugin offers the following features:

‚úÖ Enhancing text writing

‚úÖ Correcting grammar and spelling errors

‚úÖ Adjusting text length (shortening or lengthening)

‚úÖ Adapting writing tone (formal or informal)


Here's how you can use the plugin:

1. Run the plugin

2. Select a text

3. Choose the desired action from the dropdown menu.

4. Click the "Rewrite text" button.

plugins.name: Time Saver
plugins.description:
üëâ Save ton of time in your design workflows like variant making, design system, prototype, animations etc.

Welcome to Time Saving Experience in Figma.

Explore Playground & Help

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

üöÄ Update (June 02, 2022)

  • Now new users can take a trial of this plugin without any signups.
  • Existing unpaid users also will be able to try this plugin once again.
  • If you have already paid before June 02, 2022 then please click on the buy now button and enter the license key received in email by gumroad to use the plugin with lifetime access.
  • Licence key will be automatically bound with your current Figma account from which you will apply the licence key.
  • Plugin will be opened faster from now on.
  • Other performance improvements to make this plugin more reliable.
  • Please send a feature request to figterate@gmail.com


Features brief

1.Variations

  • Automatically create many variations with layer on & off functionality.
  • Layer names will be updated automatically to show them as property in variant, so no more manual work now. (Optional)
  • These features support multiple component operations at same time.


1.1 Unique Combination

This feature will create variations for all possible unique combinations from all selected layers of components.


1.2 Hide one by one & show others

This feature will create variations by hiding one by one layer & showing other layers from all selected layers of components.


1.3 Show one by one & hide others

This feature will create variations by showing one by one layer & hiding other layers from all selected layers of components.


Use Cases

  • When you want to create many variations for many UX components like buttons, chips, cards, text fields, tooltip, navigation drawer, app bar etc.
  • When you want to make variant out of all these created variations of components within no time.


Prerequisites

  • This feature can be used with components only.
  • Selected layer name must be unique per component if you turn on switch "Update layer name for variant property"


2.Clone

  • Automatically create components with incremental changes in any property for selected layers in components.
  • This feature can make variations from any component with your desired changes in properties like X Position, Y Position, Width, Height, Rotation, Radius, Stroke, Opacity etc.
  • Layer names will be updated automatically to show them as property, so no more manual work now. (Optional)
  • You can ignore current value of property for selected layers and start with 0(Zero) to create components. (Optional)
  • These features support multiple component operations at same time.


Use Cases

  • When you want to turn hand of any character at different angles.
  • When you want to move any object with specific distances in incremental manner.
  • Similarly, when you want to change different properties in incremental way for any selected layer.


Prerequisites

  • This feature can be used with components only.
  • Selected layer name should be unique per component if you turn on switch "Update layer name for variant property"


Example

Step 1:

Draw a rectangle of 100 width & 100 height & make it a component.

Step 2:

Now in "Time Saver" plugin set following values in clone section.

  • Iteration: 05, X = 5+, Y = 5+, Width = 5+, Height = 5+
  • Turn off 'Ignore current value & start with 0'
  • Turn off "Update layers name for clone property" (Optional)

Now press create button and it will create 5 components with updated properties, you can verify now.


Supported input values & its results

Following values are for example only, you can enter any desired value in any property in clone.

For iteration value = 5

  • 2+ will clone objects with updated value like 2, 4, 6, 8, 10
  • 2- will clone objects with updated value like 2, 0, -2, -4, -6
  • 2* will clone objects with updated value like 2, 4, 8, 16, 32
  • 2 will clone objects with same value as 2, 2, 2, 2, 2


Notes

  • (minus) value supported only in X & Y Positions.
  • Figma supports opacity between 0 to 100 %. So, if selected object has 100 & opacity then + (plus) & * (multiply) operation will throw error.


3.Prototype

  • Copy and paste prototype for one or many objects like Frames, Components, Instances, Variants in short wherever Figma supports prototype interactions.
  • These features support copy & pasting prototype for one OR many interactions.


3.1 Copy

Copy prototype from any object whether it is

  • Single object with single interaction or multiple interaction
  • Multiple objects with single interaction or multiple interactions.


3.2 Paste

3.2.1 Paste as copied on one or many

  • You can paste copied prototype on one or many objects.
  • Example: When you have copied prototype from 3 object then you can paste it on same number of object or on multiply number of objects like 3 or 6 or 9.
  • This will behave as multi paste feature but in multiply manner.

3.2.2 Paste & connect all layers

  • When you have copied interaction from one object then it can be pasted on one or many objects.
  • And you can connect selected objects with each other in selected direction.
  • You can also connect last object with first object. (Optional)


Use Cases

  • When you want to animate anything with repetitive interaction for multiple objects whether it is in variant or not.
  • Let's say you have added state interaction between 5 different buttons and now you want to apply this to all variations of buttons in design system.


Prerequisites

  • Minimum one prototype or interaction should be added on selected object to copy it.


‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Trial

For trial, you will get 50 attempts to try all plugin features.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Pricing

üéâ No Subscriptions

Pay once $50 and get lifetime access with free updates.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

License

You need to buy licence to use plugin. After installing "Time Saver" plugin click on "buy now" button and enter licence key received into email to activate it.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

We build products to iterate faster in Figma & Figjam.

As passionate team at Figterate we are committed to bring new innovations for design & UX workflow to save time.

Happy designing.

plugins.name: Connect
plugins.description:
Mirror any screen to any file and create global userflows without duplicating your content. Update them whenever you want.


Use cases


1. Put together multiple screens from different files into a single one without duplicating your content. Screens get imported as images so they are not directly editable. This allows you to keep your source files organized and create global flows to present to PMs, POs, Stakeholders, etc. Screens keep connected by their Artboard name so you can update them whenever you need if there are any changes to the source files.


2. If creating device mockups you can mirror your screens to import images from your screens quickly without manually copy pasting them.


How to use


1. Create a new file where you want to import all of your files.

2. Generate an access token from your Settings page under your profile name.

3. Copy the generated token.

4. Open the Connect plugin and paste your token.

5. You can now paste any file link you want to import.

6. Select the screens you want to import. You can search through them, or filter by pages.

7. Hit 'Connect Selected' and that's it!


You can now use arrow plugins to connect your screens if you need to create a flow. If you make any changes to the original screens just import your file again and select the screens you want to overwrite. Keep in mind you need to name your artboards accordingly.


Creating Connect

Follow updates

accepted.description: In love with Code, Motion and Typography. I really, really enjoy building stuff and prototyping üá®üá¥
